product_name: Black Diamond WindWeight Liner Gloves - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Form-fitting, breathable Black Diamond WindWeight Liner Gloves for women are windproof to keep hands warm while allowing maximum digital dexterity. Liner gloves effectively insulate under a waterproof shell (not included) and resist blustery weather when worn solo. Polartec(R) Windbloc(R) fleece blocks wind, contours comfortably to your hands and allows excellent freedom of movement. Goat-leather suede palms with silicone dots on thumbs and fingertips provide a sure grip and remain supple, even in wet weather. Black Diamond WindWeight Liner Gloves for women have elasticized wristbands to keep the weather out and your body heat in. Closeout.
short_description: Form-fitting, breathable Black Diamond WindWeight Liner Gloves for women are windproof to keep hands warm while allowing maximum digital dexterity.
